welcome_message_title: Welcome to San Andres Villa Seca
welcome_message_body: "Welcome to San Andres Villa Seca, a charming city known for its vibrant culture and beautiful landscapes. We hope you enjoy your stay and take the time to explore all that our city has to offer!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Base Aerea Del Sur Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Base Aerea Del Sur Airport handles all cargo and freight operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Quetzaltenango Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Quetzaltenango Airport handles all freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport for all passengers.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Coatepeque Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport for passengers to use.
